inclusion.criterion: written informed consent prior to any study-related procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: age at least 18 years and equal to or below 70 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: present diagnosis of AA or secondary GBM
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: measurable lesion (> 1 ccm in volume, central MRI review)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: lesion (or sum of lesions) does not exceed 50 ccm in volume (central MRI review)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tumor is localized supratentorially (central MRI review)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: not received more than one chemotherapy regimen
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: on a maximum dose of 4 mg/day dexamethasone or equivalent doses for other corticosteroids, which has been stable or decreasing for at least 3 weeks prior to Screening
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: females of childbearing potential must have a negative beta-HCG pregnancy test at Screening
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patient unable or not willing to comply with the protocol regulations
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: tumor surgery, tumor debulking, or other neurosurgery within 3 months prior to randomization
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: radiotherapy or stereotactic (gamma knife) radiosurgery within 3 months prior to randomization
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: prior interstitial brachytherapy of the brain with permanent implants
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: chemotherapy, hormone therapy, or any other therapy with established or suggested anti-tumor effects within 4 weeks (nitrosoureas: 6 weeks) prior to randomization
exclusion.label: triggers
